LanguageData.NymphsJoin_desc: 一个性奴将会加入殖民地\n这是一个事件，人物会无视其他玩家设定获得特性。
LanguageData.male_nymph_chance_desc:
男性奴的生成概率

有效值: 0 - 100
默认: 0
LanguageData.futa_nymph_chance_desc:
人妖性奴的生成概率

有效值: 0 - 100
默认: 0
LanguageData.futa_natives_chance: natives扶她和人妖的生成概率
LanguageData.futa_natives_chance_desc:
Futa/Trap natives spawn chance 
(industrial techlevel and below) 

Valid range: 0 - 100
Default: 0
LanguageData.futa_spacers_chance: spacers扶她和人妖的生成概率
LanguageData.futa_spacers_chance_desc:
Futa/Trap spacers spawn chance 

有效值: 0 - 100
默认: 5
LanguageData.STD_FromFloors_desc: 小人会在肮脏的环境中感染性病
LanguageData.sexneed_decay_rate_desc: 0%表示没有性需求\n1000000%表示小人们会日天日地 推荐范围: 50% 到 200%。
LanguageData.SexMinimumAge_desc: 低于此年龄的小人不会有任何性行为
LanguageData.SexFreeForAllAge_desc: 低于此年龄的小人只会和年龄差距2岁以内的小人发生性行为。
LanguageData.animal_on_animal_enabled_desc: 可能会出现异种交配或怀孕，驯养动物不受这个选项影响。
LanguageData.necrophilia_enabled_desc: 一般只有恋尸癖会与尸体交配，但非常性饥渴的普通小人也可能会奸尸。
LanguageData.cum_filth_desc: 性行为后会留下精液需要打扫，会使小人的工作量增加。
LanguageData.cum_on_body_desc: 会在健康面板显示身上的精液。
LanguageData.cum_on_body_amount_adjust: 调整粘在身上的精液数量
LanguageData.cum_on_body_amount_adjust_desc: 设置小人身上的精液量。
LanguageData.cum_overlays: 显示小人身上的精液图像
LanguageData.sounds_enabled_desc: RJW特有的一些音效，需要先开启游戏音量
LanguageData.RPG_direct_control_desc: 可以手动指定小人发生性行为
LanguageData.RPG_hero_control_desc: 选择一个小人作为玩家化身进行控制
LanguageData.RPG_hero_control_HC_desc: 适用于多人模式，只能设置一个化身。\nget some lube, you'll need a lot of it.
LanguageData.rape_enabled_desc: 从现实的角度来说，边缘世界会发生强奸。\n被强奸的小人会情绪低落。
LanguageData.VisitorsCanCP: 客人可以强奸慰安犯人
LanguageData.VisitorsCanCP_desc: 客人可以强奸慰安犯人。
LanguageData.AnimalsCanCP: 动物可以强奸慰安犯人
LanguageData.AnimalsCanCP_desc: 动物可以强奸慰安犯人，需要开启恋兽癖。
LanguageData.NonFutaWomenRaping_MaxVulnerability_desc: 只有脆弱性低于这个数的女性可以被强奸。\n有效值: 0 - 300%
LanguageData.SettingHookupsEnabled: 开启乱交（请求协助翻译相关内容）
LanguageData.SettingHookupsEnabled_desc: 小人们会任意发生性行为。
LanguageData.SettingNoHookupsDuringWorkHours_desc: 设置是否在工作时乱交。\n性奴会无视这个设置。
LanguageData.SettingColonistsCanHookupWithVisitor_des: 设置殖民者能和访客乱交。
LanguageData.SettingCanHookupWithPrisoner: 普通小人能和囚犯乱交
LanguageData.SettingCanHookupWithPrisoner_desc: 普通小人能和囚犯乱交。\n这个设置不会影响慰安囚犯。
LanguageData.SettingPrisonersCanHookupWithNonPrisoner: 囚犯能和普通小人乱交
前提是他们能不用离开监狱。
LanguageData.SettingPrisonersCanHookupWithPrisoner_de: 前提是他们能不用离开监狱。
LanguageData.SettingNymphosCanPickAnyone: 性奴能和任何人性行为
LanguageData.SettingNymphosCanPickAnyone_desc: 性奴能和任何人性行为，但需要遵守以下设置。
LanguageData.SettingNymphosCanHomewreck_desc: 和已经有对象的小人发生性行为。
LanguageData.SettingNymphosCanHomewreckReverse_desc: 能被有对象的小人邀请。
LanguageData.SettingHookupChanceForNonNymphos_desc: 淫荡的小人会寻求乱交。\n仅当小人完成工作起效，每小时进行一次判定。默认概率30%
LanguageData.SettingMinimumFuckabilityToHookup: 进行乱交的最低性能力
LanguageData.SettingMinimumAttractivenessToHookup: 进行乱交的最低吸引力
LanguageData.SettingMinimumAttractivenessToHookup_des: 原版吸引力\n 默认50%.\n 性奴>0.
LanguageData.submit_button_enabled: 在设计小人的时候开启提交按钮
LanguageData.submit_button_enabled_desc: 提交按钮允许你跳过一些步骤，\n如果honor comes before life对于你，禁用此功能（请求协助翻译）. \n当你改变主意了，他会一直在那等你。
LanguageData.RJW_designation_box_desc: 切换在小人的控件GUI中显示RJW按钮组。
LanguageData.StackRjwParts_desc: 把RJW信息堆叠在健康面板\n(标签 x 数量)
LanguageData.maxDistancetowalk_desc:
在多少距离内允许性行为。受障碍物和小人速度影响
默认 250 ~20 cells.

少于100时,会无视障碍物，可能导致小人走过大半个地图。
LanguageData.override_RJW_designation_checks_desc: 允许无视情况指定角色
LanguageData.AddTrait_Rapist_desc: 强奸次数大于总性行为的12%，且性行为次数大于10
LanguageData.AddTrait_Masocist_desc: 被强奸后有几率获得受虐狂特性
LanguageData.AddTrait_Nymphomaniac_desc: 吸入性欲蘑菇并有10次以上性行为可能获得性欲亢进
LanguageData.AddTrait_Necrophiliac_desc: 10次或以上性行为有一半是尸交则可能获得
LanguageData.AddTrait_Zoophiliac_desc: 10次或以上性行为有一半是兽交则可能获得
LanguageData.WildMode_desc: 实验功能 - 不保证稳定性。 \n没有任何性行为限制。
LanguageData.GenderlessAsFuta_desc: 后果自负。\n无性别者会按照扶她的规则生成。
LanguageData.DevMode_desc: 启用日志和stuff之类的东西，一般不需要。
LanguageData.DebugLogJoinInBed: 日志记录乱交搜索信息
LanguageData.DebugLogJoinInBed_desc: 为了找bug记录的非常琐碎的东西，\n只有开发者会用到。
LanguageData.InterspeciesImpregnantionModifier_desc: 比率为20％时，跨种机率是同种的五分之一，依此类推。\n\n有效值: 0 - 100%
LanguageData.UseParentMethod_desc: 开启后会继承父母的一些特性，\n关闭则只继承母亲特性。
LanguageData.OffspringLookLikeTheirMother_desc:
100%意味着肯定是母亲种族，
0%则是肯定为父亲种族。

有效值: 0 - 100%
LanguageData.OffspringIsHuman_desc:
100%意味着肯定是母亲种族，
0%则是肯定为父亲种族。

有效值: 0 - 100%
LanguageData.OffspringIsHuman2_desc:
100%意味着肯定是兽类种族，
0%则是肯定为人类种族。

有效值: 0 - 100%
LanguageData.egg_pregnancy_implant_anyone: 蛋蛋可以被任意种族注入
LanguageData.egg_pregnancy_implant_anyone_desc: （请求协助翻译）关闭后只能同种族注入
LanguageData.egg_pregnancy_fertilize_anyone: 蛋蛋可以被任意种族生产
LanguageData.egg_pregnancy_fertilize_anyone_desc: （请求协助翻译）关闭后能同种族生产
LanguageData.MechanoidImplanting_desc: （请求协助翻译）允许使用机械探测和植入。
LanguageData.CP_pregnancy_desc: 选择使用哪种怀孕系统
LanguageData.genetic_trait_filter_desc: 开启后使用rjw/Defs/NonInheritedTraits.xml过滤不该被继承的特性
LanguageData.RJW_fertility_endAge_male_desc: 动物按照年龄比例计算
LanguageData.RJW_fertility_endAge_female_humanlike_de: 女性不育年龄低于男性，其他人形种族也受此影响。
LanguageData.RJW_fertility_endAge_female_animal_desc: 大部分雌性动物长期具备生育能力
LanguageData.In_human_years: 动物根据寿命按比例计算年龄
LanguageData.ComplexImpregnation_desc:
When enabled, the impregnation chance between species depends on the difference in the body structure and size. Examples: Human/Winged humanoid : ~95% Human/Harpy : ~75% Human/Dog : ~30% Human/Chicken : ~5% Wolf/Dog : ~95% Wolf/Chicken : ~5% Rooster/Harpy : ~30%
Note that the chance is further lowered by the base animal and human pregnancy sliders.
LanguageData.vaginal_desc:
会根据其他因素进一步调整

有效值: 1 - 200
默认: 120
LanguageData.scissoring_desc: 双腿相对的性交方式，默认: 50
LanguageData.sixtynine_desc: 69的频率，需要两人都有生殖器。默认: 69
LanguageData.FapEverywhere_desc: 小人会在任何地方手淫
LanguageData.FapInBed_desc: 小人将会在ta的床上自慰
LanguageData.RapeSoundAlertColonist: 仅当被强奸者是殖民者
LanguageData.RapeAlertColonist: 仅当被强奸者是殖民者
LanguageData.SexualityAsexual_desc: 过低或没有性能力，属于性冷淡。
LanguageData.MaxQuirks_desc: 小人被创建时能有的最多性癖
LanguageData.RJW_Opportunistic_Infection_Message: {0} 因免疫系统虚弱受到感染。
LanguageData.RJW_Syphilis_Damage_Message: {0} 受到了 {1} {2} 的永久性损害，由于先前的 {3} 感染。
LanguageData.RJW_VisitorSickWhore: {0} 拒绝了 {1} ，因为ta看起来不太健康。
LanguageData.PawnCantRapeCP: 目标不健康或无法到达该位置。
LanguageData.PawnCantRapeCP0: 这个小人没有性行为，不健康或无法强奸。
LanguageData.PawnCantRapeCP1: 这个小人不是单身，ta的对象可能在旁边。
LanguageData.PawnCantRapeCP2: 这个小人不是恋兽癖，无法强奸动物。
LanguageData.CommandSubmitDesc: 趴下并允许任何人（动物）干。
LanguageData.RJW_PregnantText: {0} 怀孕并且要当妈妈了，请小心，饥饿或外伤会导致流产
LanguageData.RJW_Contractions: {0} 正在分娩! 即将出生!
LanguageData.RJW_EggContractions: {0} 正在分娩! 蛋蛋即将出生!
LanguageData.ForComfortRefuseDesc: 不会同意当公交车，\n需要受虐特质。
LanguageData.ForServiceDesc: Mark for whoring - Will try to hook up with visitors. - Entertains other colonists if not busy. - Tries to refrain from masturbation while on the job, may cause frustration.
LanguageData.ForBreedingRefuseDesc: 不会兽交，因为ta不是恋兽癖
LanguageData.ForBreedingAnimalDesc: 允许这些动物和恋兽殖民者性行为
LanguageData.ForMilkingDesc: 获取奶或其他生物制品
LanguageData.ForHeroDesc: Set pawn as player character -Can only be set once. -Can't be turned off.
LanguageData.MessyQuirk: Messy {pawn} not only produces copious amounts of fluid during sex but {pawn_pronoun} rarely bothers to clean {pawn_possessive}self afterwards.
LanguageData.PodophileQuirk: Podophile (foot fetish) {pawn} really likes feet and prefers foot-related sex acts.
LanguageData.TeratophileQuirk: Teratophile (attraction to the monstrous and disfigured) {pawn} prefers ugly partners. {pawn_pronoun} would also prefer larger and wilder animals if {pawn_pronoun} were into that sort of thing...
LanguageData.EndytophileQuirk: Endytophile (clothed sex fetish) {pawn} prefers to keep {pawn_possessive} clothes on during sex.
LanguageData.ExhibitionistQuirk: Exhibitionist {pawn} enjoys having sex where others can see.
LanguageData.GerontophileQuirk: Gerontophile (attraction to the elderly) {pawn} prefers older partners (55+ on a human scale).
LanguageData.SomnophileQuirk: Somnophile (sleeping or unconscious partners) {pawn} prefers {pawn_possessive} partners to be asleep and consenting. Or failing that, at least asleep...
LanguageData.SapiosexualQuirk: Sapiosexual (attraction to intelligence) {pawn} prefers smart partners.
LanguageData.FertileQuirk: Fertile {pawn} has unusually high base fertility and so is more likely to have children.
LanguageData.InfertileQuirk: Infertile {pawn} has unusually low base fertility and so is unlikely to have children.
LanguageData.ImpregnationFetishQuirk: Impregnation fetish {pawn} really likes the idea of someone becoming pregnant. {pawn_pronoun} prefers partners and sex positions where there is a possibility of pregnancy. {pawn_pronoun} doesn't care if {pawn_pronoun} is getting pregnant or {pawn_possessive} partner is as long as babby is formed.
LanguageData.PregnancyFetishQuirk: Pregnancy fetish {pawn} prefers partners who are visibly pregnant.
LanguageData.IncubatorQuirk: Incubator {pawn} has birthed so many eggs that {pawn_possessive} body has adapted to handling them. {pawn_possessive} egg incubation speed has increased.
LanguageData.BreederQuirk: Breeder {pawn} has given birth so many times that {pawn_possessive} body has adapted to breeding. {pawn_possessive} pregnancies are shorter and produce more offspring.
LanguageData.VigorousQuirk: Vigorous {pawn} is invigorated by sex. {pawn_pronoun} feels more rested afterwards than before.
LanguageData.ChitinLoverQuirk: Chitin lover {pawn} enjoys the smooth strength of a chitinous exoskeleton. {pawn_pronoun} prefers arachnoid or insectoid partners.
LanguageData.DemonLoverQuirk: Demon lover {pawn} is after the naughty ones. {pawn_pronoun} prefers {pawn_possessive} partners to come from the literal depths of hell, or at least look the part.
LanguageData.FeatherLoverQuirk: Feather lover {pawn} loves that downy fluff. {pawn_pronoun} prefers avian or dinosaur partners. Because dinosaurs are birds and have feathers, as {pawn_pronoun} will explain at great length if given a chance.
LanguageData.FurLoverQuirk: Fur lover {pawn} prefers a partner with a thick, luxurious, snuggly-soft coat of fur.
LanguageData.PlantLoverQuirk: Plant lover {pawn} likes watering plants. If you know what I mean.
LanguageData.RobotLoverQuirk: Robot lover Which is better, 2D or 3D? {pawn} knows that 3D-printed gives you the best of both worlds.
LanguageData.ScaleLoverQuirk: Scale lover Who wouldn't want to fuck a dragon? Definitely not {pawn}. {pawn} wants to fuck a dragon.
LanguageData.SkinLoverQuirk: Skin lover {pawn} prefers {pawn_possessive} partners to have smooth sensitive skin without fur or scales getting in the way. Lucky for {pawn_objective} humans are all over the place.
LanguageData.SlimeLoverQuirk: Slime lover Because of their slippery and malleable nature slimes are very, very good at sex. As you will hear over and over if you listen to {pawn} talk for any length of time.
